actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of William Eugene Maney.

summary.text: Provides that, for purposes of payment of compensation for a service-connected disability, the injuries of a named individual shall be considered to have been suffered in the line of duty and not as the result of willful misconduct. Directs the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to pay such compensation to such named individual in full satisfaction of such claim against the United States.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of William Eugene Maney.
